description:
The Kou Empire is a large military nation, considered one of the most powerful in the current era because of the number of Dungeon Conquerors and armies it controls. Their High Priest is http://anidb.net/ch47594 [Judal], one of the five Magi of the current era. The capital is Rakushou. The empire is also described as very aggressive, using any reason to attack another nation.
Source: Magi Wiki
name: Kou Teikoku
